entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
